description: Enterprise techniques used by Winnti Group, ATT&CK group G0044 v1.0
name: Winnti Group (G0044)

techniques.comment: [Winnti Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0044) used stolen certificates to sign its malware.
[Winnti Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0044) used a rootkit to modify typical server functionality.
[Winnti Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0044) looked for a specific process running on infected servers.
